title: Chapter 1870 - The Sword Of The Nine Hells’ Transformation

Chapter 1870 - The Sword Of The Nine Hells’ Transformation

Deep within the tribulation clouds, heaven and earth were as dark as an eternal night.

The Sovereign of Sin and the other old monsters quivered from head to toe, perhaps due to excessive nerves, or perhaps due to sheer horror. Their hearts shook.

This calamitous grand tribulation was so terrifying that even the gods themselves appeared within it!!

All of them were Great Profound experts who’d proven their Daos in the Primeval Era, but they’d never even heard of a tribulation like this, let alone seen one.

Practically instinctively, the Sovereign of Sin blurted, “No one beneath the god level could possibly overcome this tribulation. He’s doomed!”

He spoke with incontrovertible force, as if it were perfectly obvious.

The other old monsters shivered. Although they were overcome with horror, they couldn’t help but feel excited and eager, too.

It was true. Such a calamitous and grand tribulation was enough to kill anyone beneath the god level. No matter how heaven-defying Su Yi was, there was no way he’d survive this.
